bibl.title: Letter from P. Allery to James H. Pou, July 2, 1915

div1.p: The Carolina Power and Light Company prefers that Carter conduct the investigation.

div1.head: Letter from P. Allery to James H. Pou, July 2, 1915
div1.opener:
CAROLINA POWER & LIGHT COMPANY.
RALEIGH, N. C.,
July 2nd, 1915.
Mr. Jas. H. Pou, Atty.
City.
Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
Referring to attached letter from Dr.
Carter, it seems to me it would be better to have
Dr. Carter make one investigation than to have
any other party make two. I feel that since Dr.
Carter has examined the pond so many times one fur-
ther examination by him may be all we need. I know note
he can come up the latter part of July, and I think
we should get him to do this, and then if we can
persuade him to come again in September so much the
better.

I will be glad for Mr. Lamb to spend as
much time with Dr. Carter as he wishes. I think we
should also agree for Dr. Carter to bring anybody
with him that he wants to assist him.
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, P. Allerry
Asst. Gen'l. Mgr. PAT/M
Enc.
